name: Flight Rising: Highlight Swipp+Bald Items (Mar'17)
description:
Highlights all Swipp & (non-goo) Baldwin Items for easy hoarding and auto-selling, depending on AH value. 

Updated: 2017-03-07

(Includes NotN + Valentine's)
additional_info: Highlights all Swipp & (non-goo) Baldwin Items for easy hoarding and auto-selling, depending on AH value. Updated: 2017-03-07 (added Caterpillars) Works together with style 138542 Original code from here. Edited and updated by me Colors: - Green: NotN Swipp - Blue: Baldwin ingredients - Yellow with blue border: Used for Baldwin and Swipp - Pink: Swipp, AH Value ~20-50kt - Red: Swipp, AH Value ~5-20kt - Orange: Swipp, AH Value ~1kt-5kt - Yellow: Swipp, AH Value ~<1kt AH values are subject to fluctuations and are only an estimate. Use at your own risk/discretion. Not affiliated with or endorsed by FR or its admins. Trying to update it within the first two days of new releases. I'm only human, so bear with me. Also see: Special + Retired Items Highlighting
